Posts.Content: It must be the day - Hi angel bunnies, I'm SmithMom - a new member, got my first call back from my first mammogram today, while working from home taking care of my high school senior who is recovering from a tonsillectomy done last week and is graduating in less than a month. I just had the mammogram last week and am scheduled for further imaging on Friday. I'm glad I found this forum - it's comforting to see most turn out ok, but I'm more than a little concerned it took 2 months to get scheduled for the darn thing and only 4 days for further imaging? I'm not looking a gift horse in the mouth, just having a rough week I guess. I don't believe there are enough middle fingers in the world for this Monday!
Posts.Title: Second Call back On Mammogram and scared

Posts.Content: Lisa, 47, NC, mom of 5 - 2 boys, 3 girls - my youngest is 18 & is graduating from high school in less than a month. I'm "Mimi" to 1 grandson & 3 granddaughters, ages 3 - 7. I work full time & am an executive professional. I had my first mammogram last week. I got a call today from my doctors office, saying I had to have further imaging due to abnormal/incomplete results. My appt. is scheduled for this Friday. I.am.scared.to.death - but am desperately trying to keep it all in perspective.
Posts.Title: ROLL CALL name, age, state and any other info to share
